page.title: 17EMPLOYMENT IN IGHTHAM
page.content: Most men in Ightham and Seal St. Lawrence parishes are currently employed. On average one person works in a family. About 75% of the working people work full time and the other 25% work part time. 12 people are self employed in the area and most people work for the KCC and banks.Most people comute to London and Tonbridge. Some people's work is based anywhere. Most people travel to work by car and train all the big firms go by aeroplane. The most miles travelled is 1500 by a lorry driving for the company called Amey Roadstone Corp.Most people work out of Ightham and work out of Kent but not many people work aboard. Not many people are boss of their company the person with the most people under them,has 100 and the least has 1.
